SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionType
An enumeration of the possible action for the player:
Arrow
Class that represents the graphic element arrow
Bag
Class that represents the graphic element bag
Bag
Represents the Bag which contains all the game Tiles
Board
Class that represents the graphic element board
Board
Represents the game board form which the players pick the Tiles
Bookshelf
Class that represents the graphic element bookshelf
Bookshelf
Represents the bookshelf where the player puts the Tiles picked from the board to achieve some goals to get points
Chair
Class that represents the graphic element chair
Chat
The class representing the chat command, used to send a message to a specific player or in broadcast
CirclePoints
Class that represents the graphic elements circle-points, where inside there is the hidden score
Client
Abstract class representing the client handler from client side.
ClientGUIController
It is the Controller of the GUI
ClientHandler
It represents the server side handler of the player; it uses the socket communication.
ClientState
It's a class used to store each information about the game when the player is in the chat
CliView
CliView is the class used to print into the terminal
Colors
Color class with the colors used for the CLI
Column
Represents the column of the bookshelf
CommandBoard
It represents a rectangle used to store the picked tiles and to order them
CommonGoal
Class that can generate one of the 12 commonGoals
CommonGoalGui
It represents the graphical element Common goal
CommonGoalToken
It keeps track of the score associated with a specific common goal
Controller
It represents the Controller of the game.
CustomEvent
It represents a custom event to be triggered when specific conditions happen
EndToken
Represents the Token given to the first player who completes his bookshelf
Game
It is the main class of the game MyShelfie, it has all the methods to update the state of the corresponding match
GameController
This class is the Controller which acts directly on the game, calling specific methods of the game to update the game state
GameServer
The class representing the server of the game
GetBoard
The class representing the GetBoard command, used to get the board of the game
GetBook
The class representing the GetBookShelf command, used to get the bookshelf of the player who used this command
GetBookAll
The class representing the command GetBookAll, used to get the bookshelves of other players
GetCommGoals
The class representing the GetCommonGoals command, used to get the two common goals of the game
GetCurrent
The class representing the GetCurrent command, used to get the nickname of the current player
GetCurScore
The class used to represent the GetCurrentScore command, used to get the current score of the player
GetHiddenScore
The class representing the GetHiddenScore command, used to get the hidden score
GetPersGoal
The class representing the GetPersGoal command, used to get player's own personal goal
GetPlayers
The class representing the GetPlayers command, used to get the nicknames of the players in game
GroupChat
The class representing the chat of the game
Handlers
The abstract class representing a generic handler.
Help
The class representing the Help command, used to get a list of the command available to the user, with the type and number of the parameters needed for each command
ICommand
The interface implemented by each command
IGame
An interface implemented by the game, which is observable
IGameErrorTurn
The interface implemented by the virtual view.
IGameObserver
The interface implemented by the virtual view that defines the methods use dby the virtual view to receive information from the game and send them to the client
Insert
The class representing the Insert command, used to insert the tiles picked and ordered into the bookshelf
JSONConverterCtoS
It's a class used to convert:
JSONConverterStoC
It's a class that manages the conversion of the server messages into JSON strings
LaunchClient
it launches the client
Launcher
Class used to launch the application
LaunchGui
 
LaunchServer
The class that launches the server
Lobby
This is the lobby of the game, where each player enters before the game can be created
LoggingPhase
An enumeration of the logging phases:
Login
The class representing the Login command, used to log into the game with a specific nickname
MessageAdapter
The class that takes in input a message from the client and parses it, decomposing it in the command and the parameters
Metrics
Class that holds all the information about the metrics of the graphic elements
MyShelfieApplication
The Class used to run the server or the client according to the parameters passed by command line
Order
The class representing the Order command, used to give an order to the tiles picked
ParsingJSONManager
It is a JSON manager, it manages all the JSON files used to initialize the board, the personal goals, the bag and the game commands
PersonalGoal
Class that represents the graphic element personal goal
PersonalGoal
Represents the Personal Goal of the game
PersonalGoalBack
Class that represents the graphic element personal goal back
Pick
The class representing the Pick command, used to pick from the board the selected tiles
Player
Represents the player of the game
PlayersPointBoard
Class that represents the graphic element that contains players' points
Pong
The class used to handle the Pong message, sent by the client in response to a Ping message sent by the server
Position
Represents the position of a Tile in the bookshelf or in the board
Quit
The class representing the Quit command, used when the user wants to quit from the game
RedCross
It represents the graphical element Red cross, which after pressed removes all the selected tiles
Remove
The class representing the Remove command, used to remove all the tiles already selected
Resources
It is a class use dto load all the resources, in particular the images of the graphical elements
RMIClient
Class representing the client.
RMIClientHandler
It's the handler of the player using the RMI communication
RMIClientInterface
Remote Interface implemented by the RMI client.
RMIServer
It is created by the game server to handle the RMI connection.
RMIServerInterface
It's the remote interface implemented by the rmi server.
ScoreToken
It represents the graphical element Score Token
Select
The class representing the Select command, used to select a specific position on the board, where there is a tile, in order to select that tile
ServerArgs
A class used to load the hostname of the server and the number of the port used to listen
SetPlayers
The class representing the SetPlayers command, used to set the number of players to play with
SocketClient
The class representing the Client handler from client side using the Socket communication.
Tile
It represents the graphical element Tile
Tile
Represents the tiles in the game
TileColor
An enumeration of the colours of the tiles
TileType
An enumeration of the types of the tiles
TurnPhase
An enumeration of the phases of the turn
View
Interface implemented by the CLI and the GUI.
ViewChat
The class representing the ViewChat command, used to view the chat and the messages inside it
Viewer
This is the main class of the GUI.
VirtualView
This class receives all the updates of the game state and all the errors cause by wrong actions of the player and sends everything to the client
